Class that handles pairs of images and labels that are on disk

Model of the neural network that detects faces for facial detection

FpsHelper

class FPS

Bases: object

Class to compute the FPS

getFps()

Accessor for the FPS

setFps()

Computes the FPS

start()

To reset the start time, can be used if the part we want to compute is not right after the init.

writeFpsToFrame(frame)

Write the FPS to an OpenCV image.

Parameters

frame (ndarray) – Image with shape (height, width, 3)
